timeline.bodyText: I think used lower case quite consequently so far.
timeline.author: ppalaga
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: I'll change it in a follow up commit. AFAIK, the keyword search on code.quarkus.io is case insensitive, so it'll still work fine with a mixture of upper & lower case.
replies.author: jamesnetherton
